Expansive practice fight

Back to arena

Also, from time to time, so-called extensive practice fights are held. Basically, it's the same thing, but longer and much more intense. I would advise you to bring some of your men with you, it might be good practice for them. Just do not forget - no teams in there, otherwise you will be disqualified.[ib:closed][if:convo_bared_teeth]
And what about these expansive practice fights, are they rewarded too? How much are the prizes?
I'd like to choose my gear.
Alright{?WEAPON_CHOICE_HAS_PRICE}, but it will cost you {WEAPON_CHOICE_PRICE}{GOLD_ICON}{?}{\?}! Which weapon set are you taking?[ib:closed][if:convo_bared_teeth]
I'd like to get better gear.
Actually, nevermind.
I'd like to participate in an expansive practice fight...
Well, gather your men and go to it! Don't forget to grab a practice weapon on your way down.[if:convo_approving]
I'll do that with standard gear.
Sure. Although I'd like to take a new loadout.
Tournaments are currently being held in {TOURNAMENTS} {?TOURNAMENTS.PLURAL_FORM}towns{?}town{\?}.{NEW_LINE}{TORNAMENT_LIST.START}{?TORNAMENT_LIST.IS_PLURAL}{NEW_LINE}{?}{\?}{TORNAMENT_LIST.END}

{VALOR_PRIZES_DESCRIPTION}{CHAMPION_PRIZE_DESCRIPTION} Sounds good, eh?[if:convo_nonchalant]
If you can beat {OPPONENT_COUNT_1} opponents before going down, you'll earn {PRIZE_1}{GOLD_ICON}.
If you can beat {OPPONENT_COUNT_1} opponents before going down, you'll earn {PRIZE_1}{GOLD_ICON}. And you'll get {PRIZE_2}{GOLD_ICON} for striking down at least {OPPONENT_COUNT_2} opponents.

If you can beat {OPPONENT_COUNT_1} opponents before going down, you'll earn {PRIZE_1}{GOLD_ICON}. You'll get {PRIZE_2}{GOLD_ICON} for striking down at least {OPPONENT_COUNT_2} opponents and {PRIZE_3}{GOLD_ICON} if you can defeat {OPPONENT_COUNT_3} opponents.

If you can beat {OPPONENT_COUNT_1} opponents before going down, you'll earn {PRIZE_1}{GOLD_ICON}. You'll get {PRIZE_2}{GOLD_ICON} for striking down at least {OPPONENT_COUNT_2} opponents, {PRIZE_3}{GOLD_ICON} if you can defeat {OPPONENT_COUNT_3} opponents, and {PRIZE_4}{GOLD_ICON} if you can survive long enough to beat {OPPONENT_COUNT_4} opponents.

If you can beat {OPPONENT_COUNT_1} opponents before going down, you'll earn {PRIZE_1}{GOLD_ICON}. You'll get {PRIZE_2}{GOLD_ICON} for striking down at least {OPPONENT_COUNT_2} opponents, {PRIZE_3}{GOLD_ICON} if you can defeat {OPPONENT_COUNT_3} opponents, {PRIZE_4}{GOLD_ICON} if you can survive long enough to beat {OPPONENT_COUNT_4} opponents, and {PRIZE_5}{GOLD_ICON} if you somehow manage to defeat {OPPONENT_COUNT_5} opponents - no small feat for sure.
If you can manage to be the last fighter standing, you'll earn the great prize of the fights, {PRIZE_CHAMP}{GOLD_ICON}.
If you can manage to be the last fighter standing, on top of that you'll earn the great prize of the fights, {PRIZE_CHAMP}{GOLD_ICON}.

But if you can manage to be the last fighter standing, you'll earn the great prize of the fights, {PRIZE_CHAMP}{GOLD_ICON}. Maybe even several times more if you show a really good fight and personally defeat many opponents.

Now let me take a closer look at you, {PLAYER.LINK}. So someday I will be able to tell my children what a real grandmaster looks like! You were able to beat {OPPONENT_COUNT} in one sitting! Incredible! Oh, and of course you've earned yourself a prize of {PRIZE}{GOLD_ICON}.

Congratulations, champion! Your fight there was something to remember! As the last one standing, you of course win the top prize: {PRIZE}{GOLD_ICON}, including {VALOR_PRIZE}{GOLD_ICON} for knocking down {OPPONENT_COUNT} opponents.

Congratulations, champion! Your fight there was something to remember! As the last one standing, you of course win the top prize: {PRIZE}{GOLD_ICON}, including {VALOR_PRIZE}{GOLD_ICON} for knocking down {OPPONENT_COUNT} opponents. I have to say, it was a great fight and the crowd really loved it, so you earned every coin here, my friend.

Congratulations, champion! Your fight there was something to remember! Not only you were the last man standing, but you also fought like a beast and thus won double the standard top prize: {PRIZE}{GOLD_ICON}.

Congratulations, champion! Your fight there was something to remember! Not only you were the last man standing, but you also fought like a true hero and thus won triple the standard top prize: {PRIZE}{GOLD_ICON}.

Congratulations, champion! Your fight there was something to remember! You have personally dealt with a good half of the participants and thus earned four times more than the usual champion prize! Here you go, {PRIZE}{GOLD_ICON}.[if:convo_merry]
Congratulations, grandmaster! I am honored to host a fighter like you here. For this outstanding performance you have earned a magestic prize of {PRIZE}{GOLD_ICON}.[if:convo_merry]

{INDEX}. {TOWN_LINK}. It's {DISTANCE_ESTIMATE} and the tournament started only {TOURNAMENT_AGE} {?TOURNAMENT_AGE.PLURAL_FORM}days{?}day{\?} ago, so you should be able to get there without any problems. The prize is currently a {ITEM_PRIZE}{?GOLD_PRIZES_ENABLED} and a monetary reward of {GOLD_PRIZE}{GOLD_ICON}{?}{\?}.

The prize is currently a {ITEM_PRIZE}{?GOLD_PRIZES_ENABLED} and a monetary reward of {GOLD_PRIZE}{GOLD_ICON}{?}{\?}.

The prize is currently a {ITEM_PRIZE}{?GOLD_PRIZES_ENABLED} and a monetary reward of {GOLD_PRIZE}{GOLD_ICON}{?}{\?}.

{INDEX}. {TOWN_LINK}. It's {DISTANCE_ESTIMATE}, but the tournament started only {TOURNAMENT_AGE} {?TOURNAMENT_AGE.PLURAL_FORM}days{?}day{\?} ago, so you should be able to get there in time. The prize is currently a {ITEM_PRIZE}{?GOLD_PRIZES_ENABLED} and a monetary reward of {GOLD_PRIZE}{GOLD_ICON}{?}{\?}.

{INDEX}. {TOWN_LINK}. It's {DISTANCE_ESTIMATE} and the tournament started {TOURNAMENT_AGE} {?TOURNAMENT_AGE.PLURAL_FORM}days{?}day{\?} ago, but you should be able to get there if you move quickly enough. {INDEX}. {TOWN_LINK}. It's {DISTANCE_ESTIMATE} and the tournament started {TOURNAMENT_AGE} {?TOURNAMENT_AGE.PLURAL_FORM}days{?}day{\?} ago, so your chances of seeing it are slim. The prize is currently a {ITEM_PRIZE}{?GOLD_PRIZES_ENABLED} and a monetary reward of {GOLD_PRIZE}{GOLD_ICON}{?}{\?}.

Champion prize
Enable experience gain for viewers
Experience gain rate
The total number of participants in the Arena Practice. It is recommended to be a multiple of 3. Default = 30.
Еstimated number of the active participants in the Arena Practice. It is recommended to be a multiple of 3. Default = 6.
The minimum number of active participants in the Arena Practice. It is recommended to be a multiple of 2. Default = 2.
Initial number of the active participants in the Arena Practice. Any number greater than 7 will result in multiple fighters spawning together. Default = 6.
When this option is enabled, you are alowed to choose weapons for the Arena Practice.
You will have to pay this sum per a wepon stage (tier) when picking a weapon for the Arena Practice. Default = 10.
Prize for defeating at least 3 fighters in the Arena Practice. Default = 5.
Prize for defeating at least 6 fighters in the Arena Practice. Default = 10.
Prize for defeating at least 10 fighters in the Arena Practice. Default = 25.
Prize for defeating at least 20 fighters in the Arena Practice. Default = 60.
Prize for defeating at least 35 fighters in the Arena Practice. Can't be achieved with a standard number of participants. Default = 150.

Specify how last man standing in the Arena Practice should be rewarded. Standard - with a special prize. Additive - with a special prize and any valor reward earned. Multiplicative - with a special prize for each valor class earned above class I. Native is [Standard]. Default is [Additive].
Base prize for being the last man standing in the Arena Practice. Default = 250.
Experience gain rate in the Arena Practice fights. Native = 6%. Default = 16.5%.
The total number of participants in the Expansive Arena Practice. It is recommended to be a multiple of 3. Default = 90.
Еstimated number of the active participants in the Expansive Arena Practice. It is recommended to be a multiple of 3. Default = 9.
The minimum number of active participants in the Expansive Arena Practice. It is recommended to be a multiple of 2. Default = 4.
Initial number of the active participants in the Expansive Arena Practice. Any number greater than 7 will result in multiple fighters spawning together. Default = 7.
When this option is enabled, you are alowed to choose weapons for the Expansive Arena Practice.
You will have to pay this sum per a wepon stage (tier) when picking a weapon for the Expansive Arena Practice. Default = 10.
Prize for defeating at least 3 fighters in the Expansive Arena Practice. Default = 10.
Prize for defeating at least 6 fighters in the Expansive Arena Practice. Default = 20.
Prize for defeating at least 10 fighters in the Expansive Arena Practice. Default = 50.
Prize for defeating at least 20 fighters in the Expansive Arena Practice. Default = 120.
Prize for defeating at least 35 fighters in the Expansive Arena Practice. Default = 300.

Specify how last man standing in the Expansive Arena Practice should be rewarded. Standard - with a special prize. Additive - with a special prize and any valor reward earned. Multiplicative - with a special prize for each valor class earned above class I. Default is [Additive].
Base prize for being the last man standing in the Expansive Arena Practice. Default = 500.

Only heroes and troops of rank 3 and up are allowed to enter Expansive Arena Practice. When this option is enabled, lower-ranking troops will gain some experience when their comrades successfully land hits and make takedowns in the arena.
Experience gain rate in the Expansive Arena Practice fights. Native = 6%. Default = 33.3%.
Maximum bet
The maximum amount of gold that is usually allowed to be wagered in each round of a tournament. Native = 150. Default = 500.
Enable randomized betting odds
When this option is enabled, bet odds are slightly randomized, but still mostly based on the prediction of the player's success.
Allow notables participation
Allow settlement notables to participate in Tournaments. Recommended with tournament armor mods. Native is False. Default is True.
Prize reroll condition

Specify when and if tournament prizes should be rerolled. Normally prizes are rerolled when player joins the tournament - if the nubmber of participating nobles changed since the tournament was created (affects prize quality). Native is [When situation changed]. Default is [When prize tier can be improved].
Enable gold prizes
When this option is enabled, there are also gold prizes in tournaments. This is in addition to the usual prize items and bet wins.
Enable prize scaling
When this option is enabled, tournament prizes are scaling with player's renown. Slightly unconventional, but helps keep tournaments useful in the mid and late game.
Enable unobtainable prizes
When this option is enabled, elite tournament prizes can include otherwize unobtainable items and animals. Only works with prize scaling and at player clan tier 5 or 6.
Reward for the won round
The amount of gold that participants receive for each round of the tournament they won. Native = 0. Default = 0.
Renown reward for the champion
The amount of renown that tournament campion receives. Native = 3. Default = 3.
Renown reward for defeated heroes

Whenever a tournament participant strikes down a hero who has a comparable or higher renown or a higher overall tournament win record, he gets the specified amount of renown. Can't exceed double the champion renown reward over the course of tournament. Native = 0. Default = 1.
Influence reward for the champion
The amount of influence that tournament campion receives, if he is a noble lord of any kingdom. Native = 1. Default = 10.
Experience gain rate in the tournament fights. Native = 33%. Default = 66.6%.
Enable Team Tournaments
Adds an option for joining and participating in the tournaments as a team.
Maximum team size
The maximum number of members in a team. A team has to consist of at least two members.
Maximum number of teams
The maximum number of teams in a tournament. A tournament has to have at least 8 teams.
Team 1 Color Index
Team 2 Color Index
Team 3 Color Index
Team 4 Color Index
Set Team's banner color by index value. Check https://bannerlord.party/banner-colors/ for the list of available colors.
Roster can only be selected for team tournaments.
Join as a team
Compatibility settings
Practice loadout stages

The amount of practice loadout stages that are searched for in ObjectManager. Do not alter this setting unless you have mods that change the stages of arena practice and add corresponding character models. Native = 3. Default = 3.
